A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sadly\, despite the good elements being really good\, some of the major events sucked the life out of the ongoing story\, and those major events weren’t told in a very interesting or exciting/dramatic way. There were some subplots that neither advanced the story nor were very engaging. One entire major character could have been removed from the movie and it wouldn’t have mattered. Add to that a lot of quirky humour during very serious moments (which drained those moments of their seriousness and tension)\, underwhelming music (no new major theme)\, and a basic story that didn’t often feel exciting\, and you have a movie that left me just feeling nothing by the time it was over. I feel like I don’t care what’s going to happen next as major story elements have been destroyed and there was essentially zero cliffhanger.
